name: WaveSpawn
description:
Survive random waves full of random spawning enemies! Your score is your balance!

Screenshot your high score and share it with me, via social links below.  The Highest Scores will be credited in game!

Please leave comments, I would love to hear your feedback.

Known Issues:

When opening up menus the Player might not be able to shoot, an easy fix is to pause and unpause the game.

Enemies instantly spawn when a wave starts (Reworking) .

Enemies Spawning on top of each other.

Highscore dig happens more than once.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left Click - Shoot.

Right Click - Super Shoot. (recharges every 5 seconds and insta kills all enemies but Combust)

Space Bar to start new wave.

Tab to open store when wave ends. 

Power Ups:

Red - Rapid Fire.

Enemies: 

There are currently five enemies:

Soldier, Sniper, Combust, Machine Gun, Tank.

The Soldier is a normal ranged enemy with moderate damage.

The Sniper is a far ranged enemy with moderate damage.

The Combust is a average speed enemy, that does a lot of damage when contacted.  Make sure you keep your eyes peeled.

The Machine Gun enemy is a Low Health, high shooting speed, high damage  enemy. 

The Tank enemy has a lot of health and  high-damaging rounds, but lacks  speed.
